page.title: 06Work in a small Hamlet
page.content: Curling Tye Green is a very small Hamlet whose farms run down to the valley in the north. Six people went to work and only one was retired.Two of the people were part time workers while the rest were fulltime workers.What the people worked as was also varied,people worked at home,as a housewife and a car salesman.The people worked in Essex in areas such as Basildon, Woodham Walter and Chelmsford.Two people went to work by car,two people walked and two people went to work in a van.Everybodys wife or husband worked exept two whose wives were retired.Peoples wives or husbands worked in hairdressers, Broomfield Hospital and on a farm.They all travelled by a car exept one who walked.No one had any one in their family unemployed.
